Trade/Device Name(s): Polymed Therapeutics Fastep Dipstick Drugs of Abuse Screen Device
Polymed Therapeutics Fastep Dipcard Drugs of Abuse Screen Device
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Polymed Therapeutics Fastep Dipstick and Dipcard Drugs of Abuse Screen Device for qualitative detection of multiple drugs in urine using immunochromatographic assay.
Indications for Use Summary: Rapid chromatographic immunoassay for the qualitative and simultaneous detection of up to seven drugs (amphetamines, benzodiazepines, cocaine, marijuana, morphine, phencyclidine, and MDMA) in human urine for prescription use in central laboratories; provides preliminary results requiring confirmatory testing.
